class catalog.views.ProductFormView(**kwargs)¶

Form view for creating a new product.

Login required.

form_class¶

alias of ProductForm

form_valid(form)¶

If the form is valid, redirect to the supplied URL.

class catalog.views.ProductListView(**kwargs)¶

List of all available products.

get_context_data(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get the context for this view.

get_queryset()¶

Return the list of items for this view.

The return value must be an iterable and may be an instance of QuerySet in which case QuerySet specific behavior will be enabled.

paginate_by = 10¶
queryset = QuerySet¶
template_name = 'catalog_list.html'¶

class catalog.views.ProductUserListView(**kwargs)¶

List of products owned by the current user.

Login required.

Get the context for this view.

get_queryset()¶

Return the list of items for this view.

The return value must be an iterable and may be an instance of QuerySet in which case QuerySet specific behavior will be enabled.

paginate_by = 10¶
queryset = QuerySet¶
